{{cpp/experimental/ranges/title|swap {{small|(ranges::tagged)}}}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/utility/tagged/navbar}}
{{ddcl|1=
friend constexpr void swap( tagged&amp; lhs, tagged&amp; rhs ) noexcept(noexcept(lhs.swap(rhs)))
    requires Swappable&lt;Base&gt;;
}}

Swap the contents of {{c|*this}} and {{c|rhs}}, as if by {{c|lhs.swap(rhs);}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|tagged}}

===Notes===
Unlike most non-member {{tt|swap}}s in the standard library, this {{tt|swap}} is a hidden friend function declared in the body of {{tt|tagged}}, not a function template. The {{tt|tagged}} in the function declaration is the injected-class-name.
